attributes.action: The Dr Pattrick former ME (CFS) clinic to be reopened in Greater Manchester.
attributes.background:
This was a good biomedical clinic, but it unfortunately closed down.
We need it to be reopened in Greater Manchester to help the thousands of patients here, and in surrounding areas, who say they do not have the proper diagnosis and exclusion testing, support, and long-term follow up they need.

rejection.details:
This seems to be something that the Pennine Acute Hospitals NHS Trust, which runs North Manchester General Hospital, is responsible for. You can find out how to contact the Trust here:

http://www.pat.nhs.uk/contact-us/

You could start a new petition calling for more support for people with ME (CFS). We already have a petition open calling for more investment:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132362
